actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section 160 (c) (1) of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to increase from 100,000 to 300,000 barrels per day, or at least an average daily rate fully using appropriated funds, the average rate of increase in the amount of crude oil in storage in the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 160 (c) (1) of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act.
